experience.description:
THINGLINK PROJECT 
 
ThingLink is a web service which allows to create interactive media content for users. This project has social media features and standalone editor for 360 images and video. 
 
MY KEY TECHNICAL TASKS: 
- Client side migration from JSP to React & Redux 
- Configuring the Development Environment for client side 
- Architecture development of client application 
- Development and improvement of internal API 
- Development and improvement of image editor 
- GDPR implementation 
- Working on permissions for k12 users and visibility of content into ThingLink site for COPPA conformity 
- Features for sales (banners, upsells and etc. ) 
- Working with mixpanel and analysis of statistics data 
- Landing pages 
- Testing, supporting and code review 
- Implementation of 360 view & editor as IOS application 
 
Half year of mentoring 3 junior developers. 
 
PROJECT TECHNOLOGIES: 
JavaScript, React & Redux, Java 8, Cassandra, Docker, Webpack, Gulp, JUnit, Selenium

higher.name: St. Petersburg National Research University of Information Technologies, Mechanics and Optics, Saint Petersburg
